languages.text: К сожалению, пока Вольный Торговец смиренно ожидал{mf||а} своей очереди, срок действия одной из печатей на грамоте истек. Чтобы получить действующую Меркатум Табула Официале, необходимо пройти весь процесс заверения заново.

traits.locale_text: К сожалению, пока Вольный Торговец смиренно ожидал{mf||а} своей очереди, срок действия одной из печатей на грамоте истек. Чтобы получить действующую Меркатум Табула Официале, необходимо пройти весь процесс заверения заново.

languages.text: Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the document expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.
languages.original_text: К сожалению, пока Вольный Торговец смиренно ожидал{mf||а} своей очереди, срок действия одной из печатей на грамоте истек. Чтобы получить действующую Меркатум Табула Официале, необходимо пройти весь процесс заверения заново.

traits.locale_text: Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the certificate expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.

Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the document expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.

Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the document expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.

languages.text: Malheureusement, alors que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} attendait patiemment son tour dans la file, l'un des sceaux du document a expiré. Pour obtenir une Mercatum Tabula Officiale valide, il lui faudra reprendre le processus de certification du début.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the document expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.

traits.locale_text: Malheureusement, alors que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} attendait patiemment son tour dans la file, l'un des sceaux du document a expiré. Pour obtenir une Mercatum Tabula Officiale valide, il lui faudra reprendre le processus de certification du début.

languages.text: 遗憾的是，当行商浪人耐心地排队时，文件上的其中一个印章过期了。行商浪人不得不从头开始整个流程，才能获得有效的帝国官方行商执照。
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the document expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.

traits.locale_text: 遗憾的是，当行商浪人耐心地排队时，文件上的其中一个印章过期了。行商浪人不得不从头开始整个流程，才能获得有效的帝国官方行商执照。

languages.text: 残念なことに、自由開拓者が行列で辛抱強く自らの番を待っている間に、書類に押された印章のひとつが失効してしまった。有効なメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを取得するためには、すべての認証手順を一からやり直さなければならない。
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the document expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.

traits.locale_text: 残念なことに、自由開拓者が行列で辛抱強く自らの番を待っている間に、書類に押された印章のひとつが失効してしまった。有効なメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを取得するためには、すべての認証手順を一からやり直さなければならない。

languages.text: Während {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} geduldig in der Warteschlange darauf wartete, an die Reihe zu kommen, ist leider eines der Siegel auf dem Dokument ausgelaufen. Um eine gültige Mercatum Tabula Officiale zu erhalten, muss der gesamte Beglaubigungsprozess von vorne begonnen werden.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the document expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.

traits.locale_text: Während {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} geduldig in der Warteschlange darauf wartete, an die Reihe zu kommen, ist leider eines der Siegel auf dem Dokument ausgelaufen. Um eine gültige Mercatum Tabula Officiale zu erhalten, muss der gesamte Beglaubigungsprozess von vorne begonnen werden.

languages.text: Lamentablemente, mientras {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente esperaba su turno en la cola, uno de los sellos del documento ha expirado. Es necesario repetir el proceso de certificación en su totalidad para obtener una Mercatum Tabula Officiale válida.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the document expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.

traits.locale_text: Lamentablemente, mientras {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente esperaba su turno en la cola, uno de los sellos del documento ha expirado. Es necesario repetir el proceso de certificación en su totalidad para obtener una Mercatum Tabula Officiale válida.

languages.text: Maalesef ki Hür Tacir sırasını beklerken belgedeki mühürlerden birinin geçerlilik süresi doldu. Geçerli bir Mercatum Tabula Officiale almak için tasdik işleminin tamamı sil baştan yapılmalı.
languages.original_text: Unfortunately, while the Rogue Trader was patiently waiting for {mf|his|her} turn in the queue, one of the seals on the document expired. The whole certification process must be repeated from scratch to obtain a valid Mercatum Tabula Officiale.
